container.title: Gift cards keep on giving
container.content: Join Starbucks Rewards and start earning free drinks & food when you use gift cards in the app. (Yes, really!)*

container.title: Pass the pistachios
container.content: Your favorite winter duo is back: the Pistachio Latte and Pistachio Cream Cold Brew.

container.title: Hey there, hazelnut
container.content: Say hello to our Hazelnut Oatmilk Shaken Espresso, a rich and layered pick-me-up.

container.title: Daily delicious
container.content: The new Potato, Cheddar & Chive Bakes are full of protein-packed goodness.

container.title: Want to use your own cup?
container.content: It’s easy to use a clean personal cup—tell your barista while ordering in-café and at the drive-thru, or in the app choose ”Personal Cup.” Thanks for helping us reduce waste together.

paragraph.content: *At participating stores. Some restrictions apply. Stars cannot be earned on purchases of alcohol, Starbucks Cards or Starbucks Card reloads. See <a href='#'> starbucks.com/rewards <a> for details and earn rates.
